title: 90: Spiritual Medium: Erika Gabriel (+Bonus Broad Q&A)
itunes:title: 90: Spiritual Medium: Erika Gabriel (+Bonus Broad Q&A)
description:
Spiritual medium Erika Gabriel chats with one of the Broads! She discusses how she discovered she was a medium, what that means for her life, spirits, spirit guides, angels, what she believes happens after you die, how to cleanse a house, and more - AND THEN Jess answers some Q & A from the #broadsquad!
ERIKA GABRIEL:
Follow her @spiritualmediumerika
Website: http://erikagabriel.com
Book a reading: http://erikagabriel.com/book-a-reading/
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:

*** LOLA: For 30% off your first month’s subscription, visit mylola.com and enter CHATTY30 when you subscribe! 
*** FIRST LEAF: Get 6 bottles of wine for only $29.95, plus free shipping at tryfirstleaf.com/chatty
